Block.Instructions:
Part 1 of 7


Put a left finger on the E key for male words.
Put a right finger on the I key for female words.
Items will appear one at a time.

If you make a mistake, a red X will appear. Press the other key to continue. Go as fast as you can while being accurate.

Press the space bar to begin.

Part 2 of 7


Put a left finger on the E key for liberal arts words.
Put a right finger on the I key for science words.

If you make a mistake, a red X will appear. Press the other key to continue. Go as fast as you can while being accurate.

Press the space bar to begin.

Part 3 of 7


Use the E key for male words and for liberal arts words.
Use the I key for female words and for science words.

If you make a mistake, a red X will appear. Press the other key to continue. Go as fast as you can while being accurate.

Press the space bar to begin.

Part 4 of 7


This is the same as the last one.
Use the E key for male words and for liberal arts words.
Use the I key for female words and for science words.

Go as fast as you can while being accurate.

Press the space bar to begin.

Part 5 of 7


Watch out, the labels have changed position!
Use the left finger on the E key for female words.
Use the right finger on the I key for male words.

Go as fast as you can while being accurate.

Press the space bar to begin.

Part 6 of 7


Use the E key for female words and for liberal arts words.
Use the I key for male words and for science words.

Go as fast as you can while being accurate.

Press the space bar to begin.

Part 7 of 7


This is the same as the last one.
Use the E key for female words and for liberal arts words.
Use the I key for male words and for science words.

Go as fast as you can while being accurate.

Press the space bar to begin.
